title: hAlasyanAStham smarAmi
sahitya:
hAlAsyanAtham smarAmi kOlAhala mInAkSI samEtam


anupallavi

 mUlAdi navAdhAra nAyakam munijanAdi bhakta vara dAyakam 
malayadhvajapura maNTapa sthitam mahA gaNEsha guruguhAdiyutam


caraNam   navanIta kALI pUjitam nandi rUpAnjanEyAdi nutam 
navAdyASADha mahOtsavam nata surAsura dEva prabhAvam
